#include <iostream>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;

ll get_d(ll a)
{
    ll x,s = 0;
    while(a)
    {
        x = a%10;
        if(x&1)
            s += x;
        else
            s += 2*x;
        a /= 10;
    }
    return s%10;
}

ll get_sum(ll a, ll b)
{
    ll s = 0;
    for(ll i = a; i<=b; ++i)
    {
        s += get_d(i);
    }
    return s;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll a, b;
        cin >> a >> b;

        cout << 45LL * ((b - b%10) - (a - a%10))/10 - get_sum(a - a%10,a-1) + get_sum((b - b%10),b) << endl;
        //cout << get_sum(a,b) << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
